title: GRECERELLE 2025 Women Summer Round Neck Casual Loose Split Wrinkle-Free Long Maxi Beach Dress with Pockets (XS-3XL)
description: [Premium Materials]Made of comfort & durability 50% Rayon, 44% Polyester, 6% Spandex. Shapes well, resists shrinking and wrinkling.
[Focal Point] Maxi dress: stylish, fashionable, crew neck, sleeveless, ankle length. Complements any shoe whether sneakers or heels.

[Trendy Design]This unique maxi dress has a triangle patch at the underarm for modesty without sleeves. The side slit hem accentuates your curves, making you look charming. Convenient side pockets for hands-free movement.
[Relevant Occasion]Perfect for summer occasions like casual events, parties, and more. Pair with any shoe, add accessories, and layer for colder weather.
[Size Suggestion]This maxi dress may be long. To ensure the perfect fit, please measure from your shoulder to ankle and consult our size chart to select the right dress length.
